pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:1.4.35: _Idaṃ saṃghassa katikasaṇṭhānaṃ, imaṃ kālaṃ pavisitabbaṃ, imaṃ kālaṃ nikkhamitabbanti_. See {MS.4.1658} for the correct interpretation of this line.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:4.2.6: See [](MS.2.24) for the rule on abusive speech.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss8:4.3.14: See [](MS.2.24) for the rule on abusive speech.
